import { Outlet,Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Fragment ,useContext} from "react" import { UserContext } from "../../contexts/user.context" import '../navigation/navigation.styles.css' const Navigation = () => { const {CurrentUser,SetCurrentUser} = useContext(UserContext) const signOut = () => { console.log('user logged out') SetCurrentUser(null) } return(

logo
